1.0.name: wordpress/shared-user-table-roles
1.0.description:
When sharing the user and usermeta table between multiple wordpress installations using the same database, any role given to the user is only valid for a single wordpress installation.

This plugin ensures user roles, user capabilities and user settings are shared between the multiple installations. This is configured using a wp-config constant.

Any role set in any of the installations will be reflected in all other installations.

Caveats:

  • Compatability with wordpress multisite is unknown
